data.text: WAY too many ads!!!! It's insane trying to open a simple PDF. It was no love loss for me to uninstall. It's this way with most free applications that have anything to do with an office type needs. I find this disheartening because it seems Microsoft has free reign, while smaller developers have no chance of finding their small space in the market of a giant conglomerate.

This app closes out the file when you minimize it, doesn't remember your place, prevents you from using other functions simultaneously (like volume for some reason), has a finicky zoom feature that might jump you to a completely different scroll point in the document, harasses you with push notifications, and is really difficult to close thanks to one of the most insidious ad placement systems I've yet seen. I didn't even use it for editing—it was such a chore to read docs alone. Can't recommend

I never had the chance to properly use the app due to all of the ads. I started with a single worksheet in Word. There was no easy way to take work from my email and paste into Word, thankfully I knew about Ctrl V. As I started to work on the doc, the ads at the bottom of the screen started to quickly pile up in under 15 secs. The ads started at the bottom of the screen and kept compounding one on top of another until I could no longer view the worksheet at ALL. I uninstalled ASAP!

Literally just horrible. App is slow and glitchy and straight up locked me inside of the app trying to swipe out but the app page would pop back up instantaneously after trying to close the app. Had to turn off my phone and let it sit for a minute before I was finally able to delete the app. Let alone nothing loads in the app even with given file permission. This app is sketch even if it works well for others. Fix your problems.

It's a great app but if u need to use it for free u will have to watch a 2 min add ,then you won't have to pay for the feature you need. example: your signature. Underlining and so on..u get the idea. But I truly love that it keeps track of your documents in a file system that make everything easier to find things...ty for that.

It's says PDF editing although it won't convert your document to allow editing. A doc that is save can only be viewed unless you spend wasteful amount of time saving it in other apps for editing. Text box editing doesn't line up and opens a canvas. It looks pretty but waste a lot of your time. The pen is not for signing because it doesn't show the writing.

Painful to use! Trying to look at some info & use a calculator but everything I go out I have to re open my file... Which conveniently enough means I have to watch another advert! It also places the "skip ad" options in awkward places so sometimes they don't work & you have to watch the entire advert... & It's all deliberately designed this way. I'll delete & find another App! I despise desperate business' that think this is an acceptable work practice!

Microsoft is the best. It makes one to be able to read and wrote on its programme without any hindrance. It is able to correct one in case of mistake in writing for proper spelling and synonyms if need be.

Don't use. Evertime you open it, it opens the previous document you opened instead and evertime you close a document you have to watch an add and there is always an add at the bottom of the screen causing you to press of it when trying to exit the doc. It takes up all the option slots for which app to use to open a document.

Do not download. You will be scammed into a 29.99 per month bundled service. There is a checkbox at the bottom of the payment screen that you must uncheck in order to avoid the bundled service charge. Unfortunately I did not see the checkbox until after I gave my payment info. This should be illegal-- you should only be charged if you ask for the bundle, and not if you didn't uncheck a pre-checked box.

Mostly every thing offered to consumers lately is a total disaster, complicated, stressful & time consuming. 90% of the instructions given does not work. Write in for info and the answer back is that you need more information, no matter how small or simple the question is, we out here get the same answer, "more info needed" and nothing corrected. Someone there need to realize every person does not have a brand new Mobil, but could follow your instructions, IF they worked. Get good workers !

Legit I was iffy at first but once you take a moment and read everything. You get and ease on how simple the app makes it to navigate through a what I at first thought was a difficult sea of complexity. I strongly recommend it to all and for all people. Just give yourself some patience.

This app scares me, first of all it asked for my credit card then they said I needed to use another one, and they got a box checked for music, movies etc. and I want a PDF file, and if you forget to uncheck the box they gonna charge you and you didn't check the box, way too much going on🤮 I don't want nothing from nobody I'm literally shook up

It's an excellent application that enables users to access Microsoft word, pdf and documens within the device storage (Main and SD card) systems. Will also try Xcel files within my other device. Thanks to the developers.

It's a good and effective app but I don't like the fact that it closes everytime I go to another app. For example if I open a document from whatsapp and then I leave to check something maybe on Google ,the app automatically closes and takes me back to whatsapp
Useless and frustrating app!! It keeps freezing and has a lot of ad's that you can't click out of. Wouldn't recommend it at all.
Bravo, 👏 excellent app with multiple features including many easy to use services that makes any documentation easy to extract the files, view, it or even edit documents without any complications 👏📊📌
I'll give it 3 star for now reason, yes it a good up but too many ads that we have to tolerate, it's like you cant use the app for over 5 minutes without ads popping up and that is very annoying.

I've inquired about; as well as aquired into an above average percentage of overly rated apps; as per my own reasons; but haven't seen anything like This app; it's so much more useful, and helpful, and it's so conveniently simplified; I mean it's as close to ingeniousness as you can get; this app can be utilized in many different facets, and or ways, than just categorizational & organizational well beings; So Whomever you are out there people; give this app a look see a shot in the dark like me.
This app I really enjoy because it opens up every type of email..word..excel, pdf. Their is a small fee or not. Depending on what you really need. Imo, It works like a dream. Thanks.. All Docs Reader
The best app so far to date. It's been performing well anytime I put it to use. I wish you maintain the high standard and as well improve on it as need arises.

Lol it ACTUALLY works AND it's FREE AND one small ad when you open that's a still image AND doesn't have viruses, AND it literally can open or convert ANY file. Support creators like this when they monetize for reasonable amounts. I mean dang ask them if you can send them $3-5 if they're not gonna offer a vip charge!!!
Can't stand the amount of adds I barely get a chance to see what the document is, all I get is adds. After downloading doc it gets frozen but hey I can always watch another add.
He keeps things separated nicely so they are easier to navigate. If you're looking for a decent file manager Office extension I recommend giving it a try
Simply exits after a few seconds when I attempt to open a file. UPDATE: After my 4th attempt it can now open the file. Still a pain waiting on a file to open, so I still give it a 1 star rating.
A very good application for wireless file transfer, user-friendly, and has a good environment, considering also the conciseness etc.. Thank you for the very useful App..
The app helps to open all documents, but when you want to reopen your previous messages, it doesn't help. Kindly work on that aspect. Thanks

Helps me with all my work , pretty easy to use however I recommend you use this app on a desk top / laptop. Using this app on personal computers might will not be easier way of editing your work space.
Very useful app. Easy to navigate app. Read, edit, convert, and easily manage a variety of file types & documents from your phone or tablet!!!
Well, this app is amazing, able to open about any format there is. Colours appear as they are and editing is very easily accessible.

Very bad experience of using this application. I have open different files by using this but there is only one file which is never removed. Whenever I open next file in it still the previous one is open again and again
The adverts are damn annoying. It's quite pathetic having to wait for your document to open only to be interrupted by adverts. Too many faults you can't even put your phone on landscape..
This app is essential for opening documents of all types word, excel, pp, and pdf. The only thing I don't like is the ads.
I don't have to go searching for a different app with each different document I attend to in the Microsoft suite! Whatever the document, I just open it with the"All Document Reader"!
This app offers a lot figuring it out isn't that user friendly if u are tech. Not so smart like me, however it is a really useful app and I enjoy all it can do!
It's really ok so far because it gives me the opportunity to view all kinds of documents. Less adverts interrupting my experience
Very good app. I am not tech savvy and have problems opening documents in different formats. With this app it opens all formats with ease. 5 stars for sure

Ads ads ads you cant do anything else but continue to get rid of adds. I paid for Microsoft 365 and for what waste of £50. Its all take your money and get sweet fanny Adams in return. Feel like throwing my phone in a river.
This is the best document reader I've used so far. Best of all its free, minimal ads and works without fail.
Collaborative editing, clean organized theme. Simple yet sophisticated. I love it, and seldom do I ever even LIKE shlt
Ads are a nuisance gosh! But anyway it is good I'm struggling on how to download and fill a pdf document that needs to be filled in details like a form or something
Still working well but I don't know why I can't highlight my converted documents and copy them to my clipboard for further manipulation.
An excellent All Document reader. Could not ask for any better as this covers All that is needed. Thank you.
It's really good and opens all my files but sometimes when you like are trying to reopen a document, then you get an ad on your page but I'll recommend
It's a really good app but you really can't make presentations or any other projects but yhea it's a great app.

Love this app but have difficult to edit excel document.Could you please help me to edit documents .Did subscrition and still nothing.Any idea if any secrets or maybe have to find somewhere, as can't explain why I can't do it. Thanks
All I ever see is a long website(or a bunch of letters) and never can view the document. Maybe I don't know how, or all the advertisements are clouding my mind! 🤬
The app sucks it will let me open the file but that's all I can't transfer it or anything and once I click out of it what I was trying to read God back to internal storage
Too many ads...almost forced to watch add to get to your documents and after time, not allowing to edit documents on mobile apps
I wasn't able to open my PowerPoint for Nursing School until I got the All Document Reader app. It's a excellent tool to have.
The only app that actually does what is advertised 2 do !! 💯 *Update : Not all that great after all !! And the Ads R never ending !! 💯 Looking 4 another App like this 1 !? But not like this 1 !? 💯🤔😎
Great reader! First time I used it, it was perfect! Easy as possible! I am using a Samsung A03s, which was about $150 when I bought it.
to much ad spam with impossible to click skip buttons. You're forced to visit the ads pages and get viruses because the buttons are hidden and small on purpose
The app is in a constant frozen state. I have close and open constantly to get to read anything from here!!
It is very good and reliable to use, but I gave 4 stars because ads are too plenty, thus slowing the time you spent on the app.
Not sure why this has permission to have access to all my files without my knowledge. Doesn't seem right. I only want to convert word files to pdf.
Bad . Too many changing screen displays when im trying to carry out activity. Asking for our opinions of your service as we are trying to leave page. Stop it.
Now that I obtained the 'delete' folder, don't know how, I am quite happy. It was quite an issue before !! Need to discover more. Thanks

I don't like this app. I'm going to delete it if you want to be able to "EDIT" your work after you "read it " once you " view it, " you have to pay $59 a year. What good does it do "TO JUST" be able to "READ"your own work? View your own work if you can't correct your own work thumbs down .
I used to buy them in the store when I had my business and they worked very well. However, they're getting so expensive. I can't afford them any more, but yes, they are very good products.
The app is amazingly good, it works well but the problem is unnecessary ads but all in all it does the great job so I rated 4 stars.
Very very very bad app bcz not fast off ,presentation slides not looking great ,ads,want too skip it takes time,and all time msg for giving a stars

Yes this app is very friendly user I use at my job but unfortunately fortunately now I don't have job so I use free because I signed in early it was free for me the basics now I can not afford But it's really good . Thanks
It's a nice app. Opens documents faster and it's not complicated easy and simple to operate.
It has a document of mine by accident and won't delete it there's no way to take it off the app. I don't appreciate that someone needs to contact me
Most of the time it displays that there's no information (documents) so I always have to go back to where documents were sent
Before it's was working nice but since it has been updated you can't create documents and you can't type anything now is very useless
More free features and extras would be lovely but overall this is a reliable and effective app that allows for precise use and quality.
I am thrilled with this app. So many files I couldn't read or open. I wish I would have downloaded this app long ago. Thanks!
Too much difficult to use .when ever we open start advertising then need to wait 1 minutes to finish advertising vedio .we are tierd to use this app
Ads are getting in the way. Distracting when trying to get a job done. Whoever decides how to make money should offer to do users ranks and see how irritating they.
Did not work for me. Despite offer of help from developer (Seemed very nice and wasbencouraged) But afraid I am not a big fan of such bundled apps!
All I can say is that this app is easy to use and views documents effectively, it's quite a recommendable app💯.
Frightened to death. It seemed to want access to all my files without telling me which ones. it wanted to access at any particular time !
I'm having an issue with allow and deletion....unless I ve read it wrong some files that may be Wiped that may be wanted. ...It's probably a useful app
I like this app very much for I can create and save my documents easily. And I can read downloaded books.

It is an easy to use app. Very user friendly. Outwardly complex, but easily understood. I personally, love it. It has made my work easy since I began using it. I promise you, I'll recommend it for anybody working with PDF and text conversions anyday.
No left to right reading options, too many ads, if you figure out the horizontal and vertical settings it's still too small to read and you have to zoom in not worth it even when it's free
Love 💕💕 that it gives everything you don't have to install multiple apps all your documents are in one place all you have to do is swipe
WhatsApp is very fast and convenient to use when I am not at the office. It is like a mini laptop on its own.
Stupid ads pops up.. than it forgets the document. Now you need to go back n look for that same document you busy with... it sucks
Thanks! The app works efficiently am now able to read all kinds of documents. It's 99.9%
To app creators if you decide to make an app that is unusable because of adds. It will not win friends.
Too much advertisement...ever time you open a doc. It's irritating especially when you are in hurry.

this app requests for me to allow them to read all my files whenever and to delete them anytime after connecting and I just don't know about it so I'm rating IT 2 stars and unless they make changes to accommodate me and Google Access to our apps and have full control over what goes on in my files I don't think it will happen sincerely Mr. Brown here on the One Plus Nord N300 5G device!!!
No instructions,or examples to see if your app function properly.How can a person know? Trail and error?
Not good; too many things; not user friendly; you are greedy people, offering too many products at the same time and snatching & confusing customers!

This app is not original. It keeps you in suspense. Has a lot of shortfalls . I had no good experience using it.

Simply excellent...like this app. Made it easy for me to access all my files without any hassle.
I love being able to find what I need with googles, all document reader..It'allowes me to see what I need to be who I am( beastly).

Why did the add pop up for this. It can't read all documents. Just the office suite and PDF.
Affords the luxury of having everything in one place. Also easy to understand and use!
I can't stand all the advertisements and I hate even more having to pay for this app. Anyone know of a free PDF reader??
It's so helpful, with a lot more functions in one place, the overall operation is made easy.
